{% verbatim %}

Class Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::TextAnnotation

TextAnnotation contains a structured representation of OCR extracted text. The hierarchy of an OCR extracted text structure is like this:

TextAnnotation -> Page -> Block -> Paragraph -> Word -> Symbol
Each structural component, starting from Page, may further have their own
properties. Properties describe detected languages, breaks etc.. Please refer
to the {::Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::TextAnnotation::TextProperty TextAnnotation.TextProperty} message definition below for more
detail.

  • Object
